### Bill's attempt of merging the data
```{r}
sales <- read.csv("sales data-set.csv")
stores <- read.csv("stores data-set.csv")
features <- read.csv("Features data set.csv")

library(dplyr)
data <- left_join(sales,stores,by = "Store")
data <- left_join(data, features, by = c("Store"="Store", "Date"="Date", "IsHoliday"="IsHoliday"))
data$Date <- as.factor(data$Date)
data$Store <- as.factor(data$Store)
data$Dept <- as.factor(data$Dept)

```


```{r}
summary(lm(Weekly_Sales ~ Dept + IsHoliday + Type + Size + Temperature + Fuel_Price + CPI + Unemployment, data))
```
